mapper.select: SELECT CONTENT, STATE, DEPTH, CREATED_AT, USER_NO FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY GROUP_NO DESC, DEPTH ASC, COMMENT_NO DESC)AS RN, R.COMMENT_NO, R.CONTENT, R.STATE, R.DEPTH, R.GROUP_NO, R.CREATED_AT, R.IDOL_NO, U.USER_NO, U.EMAIL, U.PW FROM USERS U INNER JOIN REPLY R ON U.USER_NO = R.USER_NO WHERE R.IDOL_NO = #{idolNo}) A WEHRE A.RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
